data.body:
shift o should launch a lightbox with a notes management UI. you can reorder, delete, create new, etc.

if the ticket is in stage:verification (the label), the note management ui should offer a "Reject Work?" button that works similarly to thumbs down.

data.title: shift o hotkey to create notes
